bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Pathological Condition identical with xie xie 泄瀉② , outflow. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry wo niu 蝸牛：面 上赤瘡，鼻上酒齇，久利下脫肛 , “[It cures] red sores on one’s face, wine sediments on the nose, chronic free flow discharge and prolapse of the rectum”.

② Pharmacological Effect of increased urination and defecation, including diarrhea or discharge of various body matters, following the intake of medications. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 11: 分温二 服，如人行五七里再服。當利下惡物 , “Ingest two dosages, warm. Ingest the second dosage after the time it takes a person to walk five to seven li . This will cause free flow discharge of malign items”.
